attributes.action: Stop the new build site close to Whitby Abbey, Whitby, North Yorkshire
attributes.additional_details: This is a historic building and needs protecting along with the surrounding area which is home to wildlife and insects.
attributes.background:
STOP NEW HOME BUILD ON LAND NEAR WHITBY ABBEY.
60+ new homes are to be build on land near Whitby Abbey despite objections from residents.
Whitby Town Council have objected to the plans, with “concerns over highways and access, community safety and impact on the character of the local area”.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the local authority.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
